Description.description: The record type description, limited to 255 characters.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the record.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this record is active (true) or not (false). Only active record types can be applied to records.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

NamespacePrefix.description: A unique string to distinguish this type from any others.

SobjectType.description: The type of standard object that this record type is derived from.
